title: The Favorites - NFC West Betting Preview with Colin Cowherd
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFC West Betting Preview with Colin Cowherd
description:
Colin Cowherd joins the show this week to discuss two of the best divisions in the NFL. On today's show, we start with the NFC West, where Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter offer their favorite gambling picks out west for 2022. Later, they pepper Colin with questions about coaching matchups and quarterback play, and they discuss Kyle Shanahan's ascension, Sean McVay's culture-building prowess, and so much more. #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
